response.description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories worldwide. It also sells various related services. The company's flagship product, the iPhone, is an integral part in the technology industry and has been critically acclaimed for its innovation and design. Additionally, Apple offers a range of products including iPad, Mac, iPod, Apple Watch, and Apple TV. Alongside hardware, Apple has robust platforms such as the App Store, Apple Music, iCloud, and more, which contribute to its services segment. Apple's commitment to privacy and environmental sustainability are integral to the company's business philosophy. Founded in 1976 by Steve Jobs, Ronald Wayne, and Steve Wozniak, Apple has grown to be one of the most valuable companies in the world.
